animeTitle: Chinyuuki: Tarou to Yukai na Nakama-tachi
animeDescription: A violent, trouble-making kabuki player joins a traveling monk, who happens to be have been transformed into a monkey by a curse, on a colorful journey west to ancient southern Asia.(Source: Animesonfire)
